DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine efficacy imatinib mesylate , measure response rate , patient metastatic unresectable locally advanced soft tissue bone sarcoma fail one prior treatment regimen . - Determine clinical laboratory toxic effect drug patient . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients stratify accord disease subtype . Patients receive oral imatinib mesylate twice daily . Treatment continue 1 year absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 60-120 patient ( 6-12 per stratum ) accrue study .
